alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 1:10AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Snow showers across northeastern Nevada... A band of snow showers across northeastern Nevada will move east through the early morning hours affecting portions of I-80 from just east of Battle Mountain to Wells. Expect quick reductions in visibility and light accumulations of snow of less than one half inch. Nonetheless, this could produce a few slick spots on affected roadways. Snow showers are expected to dissipate through the morning hours with additional isolated snow showers expected for the area this afternoon. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
